Name: Access Insights Section and Validate Homepage
Description: Navigate to the homepage, click on insights, and verify the return to the homepage.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to *
Step 2: Click on image Icon
Step 3: Click on div HomepageRow
Step 4: Click on link Insights -> Navigate to page ''
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Access Retirement Calculator and Validate Home Page
Description: Navigate to the homepage, access the retirement calculator, input financial data, and verify the return to the homepage.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to *
Step 2: Click on link retirementCalculator (RetirementCalculator) -> Navigate to page 'calculator#*/retirementcalculator'
Step 3: Click on input userFinancialData (UserAge)
Step 4: Enter input value in input userFinancialData (UserAge)
Step 5: Click on input userFinancialData (UserAnnualIncome) -> Navigate to page ''
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Explore Investment Finder and Return to Retirement Calculator
Description: Navigate through various tools including the retirement calculator and investment finder, then return to the homepage for verification.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to *
Step 2: Click on link RetirementCalculator2
Step 3: Click on link RetirementCalculator2 -> Navigate to page 'calculator#*/retirementcalculator'
Step 4: Click on link InvestmentFinder -> Navigate to page 'investment product finder#*/*/*'
Step 5: Click on link RetirementCalculator -> Navigate to page 'calculator#*/retirementcalculator'
Step 6: Click on link WelcomeToFidelity -> Navigate to page 'homepage#*'
Step 7: Click on link RetirementCalculator2 -> Navigate to page 'calculator#*/retirementcalculator'
Step 8: Click on div InputRow
Step 9: Click on input userFinancialData (UserAge2) -> Navigate to page ''
Step 10: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Utilize Retirement Calculator with Multiple Inputs and Reset
Description: Navigate to the retirement calculator, input various financial data multiple times, and reset to the homepage while validating each step.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to *
Step 2: Click on link retirementCalculator (RetirementCalculator) -> Navigate to page 'calculator#*/retirementcalculator'
Step 3: Click on input userFinancialData (UserAge2)
Step 4: Enter input value in input userFinancialData (UserAge2)
Step 5: Click on input userFinancialData (UserAnnualIncome2)
Step 6: Enter input value in input userFinancialData (UserAnnualIncome2)
Step 7: Click on input userFinancialData (UserRetirementSavings)
Step 8: Enter input value in input userFinancialData (UserRetirementSavings)
Step 9: Click on input userFinancialData (UserMonthlySavings)
Step 10: Enter input value in input userFinancialData (UserMonthlySavings)
Step 11: Click on link navigationActions (Next)
Step 12: Click on input userFinancialData (UserIncomeOther)
Step 13: Enter input value in input userFinancialData (UserIncomeOther)
Step 14: Click on link navigationActions (Next)
Step 15: Adjust div sliderControls by input value (InvestmentStyleSlider)
Step 16: Click on link navigationActions (Next)
Step 17: Adjust div sliderControls by input value (RequiredIncomeSlider)
Step 18: Click on link navigationActions (SeeMyResults)
Step 19: Click on link startOver (StartOver) -> Navigate to page ''
Step 20: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
